  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

    Support UART1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

    Support UART2

  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_K60
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

    Support Programmable Interval Timers

1.2.49 Choice: SysTick clock source

  • Default: KL_SYSTICK_CORECLK
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_KL_SYSTICK_CORECLK: Cortex-M0 core clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

    CONFIG_KL_SYSTICK_CORECLK_DIV16: Cortex-M0 core clock divided by 16

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

1.2.50 CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ: GPIO pin interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

    Enable support for interrupting GPIO pins

1.2.51 CONFIG_KL_PORTAINTS: GPIOA interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL , CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

    Enable support for 32 interrupts from GPIO port A pins

1.2.52 CONFIG_KL_PORTBINTS: GPIOB interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_KL , CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

    Enable support for 32 interrupts from GPIO port B pins

  • Type: Boolean

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/kl/Kconfig

    Enable support for 32 interrupts from GPIO port C pins

1.2.56 Choice: Stellaris Chip Selection

  • Default: ARCH_CHIP_LM3S6965
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S6918: LM3S6918

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S, CONFIG_LM_HAVE_SSI1
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S9B96: LM3S9B96

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S6432: LM3S6432

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S6965: LM3S6965

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S8962: LM3S8962

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM3S
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM4F120: LM4F120

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM4F, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.57 CONFIG_LM_REVA2: Rev A2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Some early silicon returned an increase LDO voltage or 2.75V to work around a PLL bug

1.2.58 Menu: Stellaris Peripheral Support

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.1 CONFIG_LM_UART0: UART0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.2 CONFIG_LM_UART1: UART1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.3 CONFIG_LM_UART2: UART2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.4 CONFIG_LM_UART3: UART3

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART3
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM4F
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.5 CONFIG_LM_UART4: UART4

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM4F
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.6 CONFIG_LM_UART5: UART5

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART5
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM4F
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.7 CONFIG_LM_UART6: UART6

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART6
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM4F
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.8 CONFIG_LM_UART7: UART7

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART7
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM4F
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.9 CONFIG_SSI0_DISABLE: Disable SSI0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.10 CONFIG_SSI1_DISABLE: Disable SSI1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.58.11 CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET: Stellaris Ethernet

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    This must be set (along with NET) to build the Stellaris Ethernet driver.

1.2.58.12 CONFIG_LM_FLASH: Stellaris internal FLASH

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Enable MTD driver support for internal FLASH.

1.2.59 Menu: Disable GPIO Interrupts

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.1 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOA_IRQS: Disable GPIOA IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.2 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOB_IRQS: Disable GPIOB IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.3 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOC_IRQS: Disable GPIOC IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.4 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOD_IRQS: Disable GPIOD IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.5 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOE_IRQS: Disable GPIOE IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.6 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOF_IRQS: Disable GPIOF IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.7 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOG_IRQS: Disable GPIOG IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.8 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOH_IRQS: Disable GPIOH IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.59.9 CONFIG_LM_DISABLE_GPIOJ_IRQS: Disable GPIOJ IRQs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.60 Menu: Stellaris Ethernet Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.60.1 CONFIG_LM_ETHLEDS: Ethernet LEDs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Enable to use Ethernet LEDs on the board.

1.2.60.2 CONFIG_LM_BOARDMAC: Board MAC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    If the board-specific logic can provide a MAC address (via lm_ethernetmac()), then this should be selected.

1.2.60.3 CONFIG_LM_ETHHDUPLEX: Force Half Duplex

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Set to force half duplex operation

1.2.60.4 CONFIG_LM_ETHNOAUTOCRC: Disable auto-CRC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Set to suppress auto-CRC generation

1.2.60.5 CONFIG_LM_ETHNOPAD: Disable Tx Padding

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Set to suppress Tx padding

1.2.60.6 CONFIG_LM_MULTICAST: Enable Multicast

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Set to enable multicast frames

1.2.60.7 CONFIG_LM_PROMISCUOUS: Enable Promiscuous Mode

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Set to enable promiscuous mode

1.2.60.8 CONFIG_LM_TIMESTAMP: Enable Timestamping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.60.9 CONFIG_LM_BADCRC: Enable Bad CRC Rejection

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Set to enable bad CRC rejection.

1.2.60.10 CONFIG_M3S_DUMPPACKET: Dump Packets

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Dump each packet received/sent to the console.

1.2.61 Menu: Stellaris SSI Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , !CONFIG_SSI0_DISABLE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.61.1 CONFIG_SSI_POLLWAIT: Poll Wait (No-Interrupt) Mode

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , !CONFIG_SSI0_DISABLE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.61.2 CONFIG_SSI_TXLIMIT: Tx Limit

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , !CONFIG_SSI0_DISABLE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    Default of 4 assumes half of the 8 entry FIFO

1.2.62 Menu: Stellaris Internal Flash Driver Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_FLASH
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

1.2.62.1 CONFIG_LM_FLASH_STARTPAGE: First page accessible by the MTD driver

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 250
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LM , CONFIG_LM_FLASH
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lm/Kconfig

    To prevent accessing FLASH sections where code is stored.

1.2.63 Choice: NXP LPC17XX Chip Selection

  • Default: ARCH_CHIP_LPC1768
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1751: LPC1751

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC175X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1752: LPC1752

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC175X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1754: LPC1754

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC175X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1756: LPC1756

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC175X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1758: LPC1758

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC175X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1759: LPC1759

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC175X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1764: LPC1764

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC176X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1765: LPC1765

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC176X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1766: LPC1766

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC176X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1767: LPC1767

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC176X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1768: LPC1768

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC176X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1769: LPC1769

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC176X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1773: LPC1773

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_SPIFI
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1774: LPC1774

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1776: LPC1776

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1777: LPC1777

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1778: LPC1778

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1785: LPC1785

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1786: LPC1786

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1787: LPC1787

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC1788: LPC1788

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64 Menu: LPC17xx Peripheral Support

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.1 CONFIG_LPC17_MAINOSC: Main oscillator

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.2 CONFIG_LPC17_PLL0: PLL0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.3 CONFIG_LPC17_PLL1: PLL1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.4 CONFIG_LPC17_EMC: EMC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTDRAM, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNOR
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.5 CONFIG_LPC17_ETHERNET: Ethernet

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_NET, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_PHY
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.6 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD: LCD controller

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X || CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.7 CONFIG_LPC17_USBHOST: USB host

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_USBHOST
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.8 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV: USB Device

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_USBDEV
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.9 CONFIG_LPC17_USBOTG: USB OTG

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_USBHOST && CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.10 CONFIG_LPC17_SDCARD: SD Card Interface

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_SDIO
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X || CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.11 CONFIG_LPC17_UART0: UART0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.12 CONFIG_LPC17_UART1: UART1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.13 CONFIG_LPC17_UART2: UART2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.14 CONFIG_LPC17_UART3: UART3

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART3
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.15 CONFIG_LPC17_UART4: UART4

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.16 CONFIG_LPC17_CAN1: CAN1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.17 CONFIG_LPC17_CAN2: CAN2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.18 CONFIG_LPC17_SPI: SPI

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC175X || CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC176X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.19 CONFIG_LPC17_SSP0: SSP0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.20 CONFIG_LPC17_SSP1: SSP1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.21 CONFIG_LPC17_SSP2: SSP1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X || CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.22 CONFIG_LPC17_SPIFI: SPIFI Interface

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_SPIFI
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.23 CONFIG_LPC17_I2C0: I2C0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.24 CONFIG_LPC17_I2C1: I2C1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.25 CONFIG_LPC17_I2C2: I2C2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.26 CONFIG_LPC17_I2S: I2S

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.27 CONFIG_LPC17_TMR0: Timer 0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.28 CONFIG_LPC17_TMR1: Timer 1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.29 CONFIG_LPC17_TMR2: Timer 2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.30 CONFIG_LPC17_TMR3: Timer 3

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.31 CONFIG_LPC17_RIT: RIT

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.32 CONFIG_LPC17_PWM0: PWM0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.33 CONFIG_LPC17_PWM1: PWM1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X || CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.34 CONFIG_LPC17_MCPWM: MCPWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC175X || CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC176X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.35 CONFIG_LPC17_QEI: QEI

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.36 CONFIG_LPC17_RTC: RTC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.37 CONFIG_LPC17_RTCEV: RTC event monitor

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_RTC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.38 CONFIG_LPC17_WDT: WDT

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.39 CONFIG_LPC17_ADC: ADC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.40 CONFIG_LPC17_DAC: DAC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.41 CONFIG_LPC17_GPDMA: GPDMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_DMA
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.42 CONFIG_LPC17_CRC: CRC engine

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X || CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.43 CONFIG_LPC17_FLASH: FLASH

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.64.44 CONFIG_LPC17_EEPROM: EEPROM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC177X || CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_LPC178X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.65 Menu: External Memory Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.65.1 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTNAND: Configure external NAND

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Configure external NAND memory and, if applicable, map then external NAND into the memory map.

1.2.65.2 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTNANDSIZE: External NAND size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTNAND
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Size of the external NAND in bytes.

1.2.65.3 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTNOR: Configure external NOR memory

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNOR
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Configure external NOR memory and, if applicable, map then external NOR into the memory map.

1.2.65.4 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTNORSIZE: External NOR size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTNOR
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Size of the external NOR in bytes.

1.2.65.5 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAM: Configure external DRAM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Configure external DRAM memory and, if applicable, map then external DRAM into the memory map.

1.2.65.6 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAMSIZE: External SDRAM size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Size of the external SDRAM in bytes.

1.2.65.7 Choice: SDRAM Width Selection

  • Default: LPC17_SDRAM_16BIT
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_LPC17_SDRAM_8BIT: 8-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_SDRAM_16BIT: 16-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_SDRAM_32BIT: 32-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.65.8 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAMHEAP: Add external SDRAM to the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Add the external SDRAM into the heap.

1.2.65.9 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTSRAM0: Configure external SRAM (Bank 0)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Configure external SRAM Bank 0 memory and, if applicable, map then external SRAM Bank 0 into the memory map.

1.2.65.10 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTSRAM0SIZE: External SRAM size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Size of the external SRAM Bank 0 in bytes.

1.2.65.11 CONFIG_LPC17_EXTSRAM0HEAP: Add external SRAM (Bank 0) to the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Add external SRAM Bank 0 into the heap.

1.2.66 Menu: Serial driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_UART0 || CONFIG_LPC17_UART1 || CONFIG_LPC17_UART2 || CONFIG_LPC17_UART3 || CONFIG_LPC17_UART4
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.66.1 CONFIG_SERIAL_TERMIOS: Serial driver TERMIOS supported

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_UART0 || CONFIG_LPC17_UART1 || CONFIG_LPC17_UART2 || CONFIG_LPC17_UART3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Serial driver supports termios.h interfaces (tcsetattr, tcflush, etc.). If this is not defined, then the terminal settings (baud, parity, etc). are not configurable at runtime; serial streams cannot be flushed, etc..

1.2.66.2 CONFIG_UART1_RINGINDICATOR: UART1 ring indicator

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_UART1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable UART1 ring indicator

1.2.67 Menu: ADC driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.67.1 CONFIG_ADC0_AVERAGE: ADC0 average

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 200
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.67.2 CONFIG_ADC0_MASK: ADC0 mask

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.67.3 CONFIG_ADC0_SPS: ADC0 SPS

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.67.4 CONFIG_ADC_CHANLIST: Use ADC channel list

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    The errata that states: "A/D Global Data register should not be used with burst mode or hardware triggering". If this option is selected, then the ADC driver will grab from the individual channel registers rather than from the global data register as this is the stated workaround in the errata.

    The ADC interrupt will trigger on conversion complete on the last channel listed in the array g_adc_chanlist[] (as opposed to triggering interrupt from the global DONE flag).

    If this option is enabled, then the platform specific code must do two things: (1) define ADC_NCHANNELS in the configuration file and (2) provide an array g_adc_chanlist[] with the channel numbers matching the ADC0_MASK within the board-specific library.

1.2.67.5 CONFIG_ADC_NCHANNELS: ADC0 number of channels

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_ADC_CHANLIST
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    If ADC_CHANLIST is enabled, then the platform specific code must do two things: (1) define ADC_NCHANNELS in the configuration file and (2) provide an array g_adc_chanlist[] with the channel numbers matching the ADC0_MASK within the board-specific library.

1.2.68 Menu: CAN driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_CAN1 || CONFIG_LPC17_CAN2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.68.1 CONFIG_CAN_EXTID: CAN extended IDs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enables support for the 29-bit extended ID. Default Standard 11-bit IDs.

1.2.68.2 CONFIG_CAN1_BAUD: CAN1 BAUD

  • Type: Integer
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_CAN1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CAN1 BAUD rate. Required if LPC17_CAN1 is defined.

1.2.68.3 CONFIG_CAN2_BAUD: CAN2 BAUD

  • Type: Integer
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_CAN2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CAN2 BAUD rate. Required if LPC17_CAN2 is defined.

1.2.68.4 CONFIG_CAN1_DIVISOR: CAN1 CCLK divisor

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_CAN1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CAN1 is clocked at CCLK divided by this number. (the CCLK frequency is divided by this number to get the CAN clock). Options = {1,2,4,6}. Default: 4.

1.2.68.5 CONFIG_CAN2_DIVISOR: CAN2 CCLK divisor

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_CAN2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CAN2 is clocked at CCLK divided by this number. (the CCLK frequency is divided by this number to get the CAN clock). Options = {1,2,4,6}. Default: 4.

1.2.68.6 CONFIG_CAN_TSEG1: TSEG1 quanta

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 6
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    The number of CAN time quanta in segment 1. Default: 6

1.2.68.7 CONFIG_CAN_TSEG2: TSEG2 quanta

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    The number of CAN time quanta in segment 2. Default: 7

1.2.68.8 CONFIG_CAN_SAM: CAN sampling

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    The bus is sampled 3 times (recommended for low to medium speed buses to spikes on the bus-line).

1.2.68.9 CONFIG_CAN_LOOPBACK: CAN looopback mode

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable CAN loopback mode

1.2.68.10 CONFIG_CAN_REGDEBUG: Register level debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Output detailed register-level CAN debug information. Requires also DEBUG and DEBUG_CAN.

1.2.69 CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ: GPIO interrupt support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable support for GPIO interrupts

1.2.70 Menu: I2C driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_I2C0 || CONFIG_LPC17_I2C1 || CONFIG_LPC17_I2C2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.70.1 CONFIG_I2C0_FREQ: I2C0 frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_I2C0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.70.2 CONFIG_I2C1_FREQ: I2C1 frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_I2C1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.70.3 CONFIG_I2C2_FREQ: I2C2 frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_I2C2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.71 Menu: SDIO Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_SDCARD
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.71.1 CONFIG_SDIO_DMA: Support DMA data transfers

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y

    Dependency: CONFIG_LPC17_GPDMA

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_GPDMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Support DMA data transfers. Enable SD card DMA data transfers. This is a marginally optional. For most usages, SD accesses will cause data overruns if used without DMA. Requires LPC17_SDCARD and config LPC17_GPDMA.

1.2.71.2 CONFIG_SDIO_DMAPRIO: SDIO DMA priority

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Default: 0x0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_GPDMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Select SDIO DMA prority.

1.2.71.3 CONFIG_SDIO_WIDTH_D1_ONLY: Use D1 only

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Select 1-bit transfer mode. This may be selected to force the driver operate with only a single data line (the default is to use all 4 SD data lines).Default: 4-bit transfer mode.

1.2.72 Menu: Ethernet driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_ETHERNET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.72.1 CONFIG_PHY_AUTONEG: Autonegiation

  • Type: Boolean
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable auto-negotion

1.2.72.2 CONFIG_PHY_SPEED100: 100Mbit/Sec

  • Type: Boolean
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , !CONFIG_PHY_AUTONEG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Select 100Mbit vs. 10Mbit speed.

1.2.72.3 CONFIG_PHY_FDUPLEX: Full duplex

  • Type: Boolean
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , !CONFIG_PHY_AUTONEG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Select full (vs. half) duplex

1.2.72.4 CONFIG_NET_EMACRAM_SIZE: EMAC RAM Size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 16384
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Size of EMAC RAM. Default: 16384 bytes

1.2.72.5 CONFIG_NET_NTXDESC: Number of Tx descriptors

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 18
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Configured number of Tx descriptors. Default: 18

1.2.72.6 CONFIG_NET_NRXDESC: Number of Rx descriptors

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 18
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Configured number of Rx descriptors. Default: 18

1.2.72.7 CONFIG_NET_PRIORITY: Ethernet interrupt priority

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Ethernet interrupt priority. The is default is the higest priority (0).

1.2.72.8 CONFIG_NET_WOL: Wake-up on LAN

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable Wake-up on Lan (not fully implemented).

1.2.72.9 CONFIG_NET_REGDEBUG: Ethernet register-level debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable low level register debug. Also needs DEBUG.

1.2.72.10 CONFIG_NET_DUMPPACKET: Enable packet dumping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Dump all received and transmitted packets. Also needs DEBUG.

1.2.72.11 CONFIG_NET_HASH: Hashing

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable receipt of near-perfect match frames.

1.2.72.12 CONFIG_NET_MULTICAST: Multicast

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default Values:
    • Default: y

      Dependency: CONFIG_NET_IGMP

    • Default: n

      Dependency: !CONFIG_NET_IGMP

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable receipt of multicast (and unicast) frames. Automatically set if NET_IGMP is selected.

1.2.73 Menu: LCD device driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_LCD
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.73.1 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_VRAMBASE: Video RAM base address

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Default: 0xa0010000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Base address of the video RAM frame buffer. The default is (LPC17_EXTDRAM_CS0 + 0x00010000)

1.2.73.2 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_REFRESH_FREQ: LCD refesh rate (Hz)

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 50
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    LCD refesh rate (Hz)

1.2.73.3 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BACKLIGHT: Enable backlight

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable backlight support. If LPC17_LCD_BACKLIGHT is selected, then the board-specific logic must provide this lpc17_backlight() interface so that the LCD driver can turn the backlight on and off as necessary. You should select this option and implement lpc17_backlight() if your board provides GPIO control over the backlight. This interface provides only ON/OFF control of the backlight. If you want finer control over the backlight level (for example, using PWM), then this interface would need to be extended.

1.2.73.4 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_TFTPANEL: TFT Panel

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    TFT Panel vs. STN display. STN display panels require algorithmic pixel pattern generation to provide pseudo gray scaling on monochrome displays, or color creation on color displays. TFT display panels require the digital color value of each pixel to be applied to the display data inputs.

1.2.73.5 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_MONOCHROME: Monochrome LCD

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , !CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_TFTPANEL
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    STN LCD monochrome/color selection. Selects monochrome LCD. This selection has no meaning for a TFT panel.

1.2.73.6 Choice: Bits per pixel

  • Default Values:
    • Default: LPC17_LCD_BPP24

      Dependency: CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_TFTPANEL

    • Default: LPC17_LCD_BPP16_565

      Dependency: !CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_TFTPANEL

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BPP1: 1 bit per pixel

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BPP2: 2 bit per pixel

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BPP4: 4 bit per pixel

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BPP8: 8 bit per pixel

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BPP16: 16 bit per pixel

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , !CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_MONOCHROME
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BPP24: 24 bit per pixel

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_TFTPANEL
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BPP16_565: 16 bpp, 5:6:5 mode

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , !CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_MONOCHROME
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BPP12_444: 12 bpp, 4:4:4 mode

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , !CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_MONOCHROME
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.73.7 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_BACKCOLOR: Initial background color

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Default: 0x0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Initial background color

1.2.73.8 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_HWIDTH: Display width (pixels)

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 480
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Horizontal width the display in pixels

1.2.73.9 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_HPULSE: Horizontal pulse

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.73.10 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_HFRONTPORCH: Horizontal front porch

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 5
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.73.11 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_HBACKPORCH: Horizontal back porch

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 40
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.73.12 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_VHEIGHT: Display height (rows)

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 272
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Vertical height of the display in rows

1.2.73.13 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_VPULSE: Vertical pulse

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.73.14 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_VFRONTPORCH: Vertical front porch

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 8
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.73.15 CONFIG_LPC17_LCD_VBACKPORCH: Vertical back porch

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 8
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.74 Menu: USB device driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.74.1 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV_EP0_MAXSIZE: EP0 Max packet size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 64
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Endpoint 0 maximum packet size. Default: 64

1.2.74.2 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV_FRAME_INTERRUPT: USB frame interrupt

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Handle USB Start-Of-Frame events. Enable reading SOF from interrupt handler vs. simply reading on demand. Probably a bad idea... Unless there is some issue with sampling the SOF from hardware asynchronously.

1.2.74.3 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV_EPFAST_INTERRUPT: EP fast interrupt handling

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable high priority interrupts. I have no idea why you might want to do that

1.2.74.4 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV_NDMADESCRIPTORS: Number of DMA descriptors

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 8
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Number of DMA descriptors to allocate in SRAM. Default: 8

1.2.74.5 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV_DMA: Enable USB device DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Enable lpc17xx-specific DMA support

1.2.74.6 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV_NOVBUS: Disable VBUS support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Define if the hardware implementation does not support the VBUS signal

1.2.74.7 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV_NOLED: Disable USB device LCD support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Define if the hardware implementation does not support the LED output

1.2.74.8 CONFIG_LPC17_USBDEV_REGDEBUG: Register level debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Output detailed register-level USB device debug information. Requires also DEBUG.

1.2.75 Menu: USB host driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_LPC17_USBHOST
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

1.2.75.1 CONFIG_USBHOST_OHCIRAM_SIZE: OHCI RAM Size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 16384
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Total size of OHCI RAM (in AHB SRAM Bank 1). Default: 16384

1.2.75.2 CONFIG_USBHOST_NEDS: Number of Endpoint Descriptors

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Number of endpoint descriptors. Default: 2

1.2.75.3 CONFIG_USBHOST_NTDS: Number of transfer descriptors

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 3
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Number of transfer descriptors. Default: 3

1.2.75.4 CONFIG_USBHOST_TDBUFFERS: Number of descriptor buffers

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Number of transfer descriptor buffers. Default: 2

1.2.75.5 CONFIG_USBHOST_TDBUFSIZE: Descriptor buffer size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 128
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Size of one transfer descriptor buffer. Default 128

1.2.75.6 CONFIG_USBHOST_IOBUFSIZE: I/O buffer size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 512
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Size of one end-user I/O buffer. This can be zero if the application can guarantee that all end-user I/O buffers reside in AHB SRAM.

1.2.75.7 CONFIG_USBHOST_BULK_DISABLE: Disable bulk EPs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Disable support for bulk endpoints.

1.2.75.8 CONFIG_USBHOST_INT_DISABLE: Disable interupt EPs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Disable support for interrupt endpoints.

1.2.75.9 CONFIG_USBHOST_ISOC_DISABLE: Disable isochronous EPs

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Disable support for isochronous endpoints.

1.2.75.10 CONFIG_LPC17_USBHOST_REGDEBUG: Register level debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC17XX , CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc17xx/Kconfig

    Output detailed register-level USB host debug information. Requires also DEBUG.

1.2.76 Choice: Memory Execution Mode

  • Default: DEFAULT_MODE
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_EXTMEM_MODE: External Memory Mode

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

      Code executes from external memory starting at address 0x8000:0000.

    CONFIG_RAM_MODE: RAM Memory Mode

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

      Code executes from on-chip RAM at address 0x4000:0000.

    CONFIG_DEFAULT_MODE: Default Memory Mode

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

      Executes from 0x0000:0000. In non-default modes, the MEMAP register is set override the settings of the CPU configuration pins.

1.2.77 CONFIG_CODE_BASE: Execuation Base Address

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Default: 0x00000000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

    This must match the expected address for the selected "Memory Execution Address":

    EXTMEM_MODE: 0x8000:0000 RAM_MODE: 0x4000:0000 DEFAULT)MODE: 0x0000:0000

1.2.78 CONFIG_PLL_SETUP: Configure the PLL

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.79 CONFIG_MAM_SETUP: Configure the Memory Accelerator Module (MAM)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.80 CONFIG_APBDIV_SETUP: Configure the APB Divider

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.81 CONFIG_APBDIV_VALUE: APB Divisor

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.82 CONFIG_EMC_SETUP: Configure EMC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.83 CONFIG_BCFG0_SETUP: Configure BCFG0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.84 CONFIG_BCFG1_SETUP: Configure BCFG1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.85 CONFIG_BCFG2_SETUP: Configure BCFG2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.86 CONFIG_BCFG3_SETUP: Configure BCFG3

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.87 CONFIG_ADC_SETUP: Configure ADC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.88 Menu: LPC214x Peripheral Support

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.88.1 CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV: USB Device

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X , CONFIG_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.89 CONFIG_LPC214x_FIO: Fast GPIO

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.90 Menu: LPC214x USB Device Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X , CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.90.1 CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV_DMA: USB Device DMA Support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X , CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.90.2 CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV_NDMADESCRIPTORS: Number of USB DMA Descriptors

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 8
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X , CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV , CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV_DMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.90.3 CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV_EPFAST_INTERRUPT: USB Device Fast Endpoint Interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X , CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.90.4 CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV_FRAME_INTERRUPT: USB Device Frame Interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X , CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.90.5 CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV_REGDEBUG: USB Device Register-Level Debug Output

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC214X , CONFIG_LPC214X_USBDEV , CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc214x/Kconfig

1.2.91 Choice: LPC31 Chip Selection

  • Default: ARCH_CHIP_LPC3131
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC3130: LPC3130

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM1, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTDRAM
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC3131: LPC3131

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM1, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTDRAM
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC3152: LPC3152

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM1, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTDRAM
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC3154: LPC3154

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM1, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTDRAM
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.92 Choice: Toolchain Selection

  • Default Values:
    • Default: LPC31_BUILDROOT

      Dependency: !CONFIG_HOST_WINDOWS

    • Default: LPC31_CODESOURCERYW

      Dependency: CONFIG_HOST_WINDOWS

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_LPC31_CODESOURCERYW: CodeSourcery GNU toolchain under Windows

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_HOST_WINDOWS
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC31_CODESOURCERYL: CodeSourcery GNU toolchain under Linux

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_HOST_LINUX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC31_DEVKITARM: devkitARM GNU toolchain

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_HOST_WINDOWS
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC31_BUILDROOT: Buildroot

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , !CONFIG_WINDOWS_NATIVE
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.93 CONFIG_LPC31_SDRAMHCLK: External SDRAM HCLK

  • Type: Integer
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    The SDRAM HCLK may be specified here (if not, it will be calculated).

1.2.94 Menu: LPC31xx Peripheral Support

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.94.1 CONFIG_LPC31_UART: UART

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.94.2 CONFIG_LPC31_SPI: SPI

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.94.3 CONFIG_LPC31_USB: USB

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.94.4 CONFIG_LPC31_MCI: MCI

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.95 Menu: External Memory Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.95.1 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTNAND: Configure external NAND

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Configure external NAND memory and, if applicable, map then external NAND into the memory map.

1.2.95.2 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTNANDSIZE: External NAND size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTNAND
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Size of the external NAND in bytes.

1.2.95.3 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAM: Configure external DRAM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Configure external DRAM memory and, if applicable, map then external DRAM into the memory map.

1.2.95.4 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAMSIZE: External SDRAM size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Size of the external SDRAM in bytes.

1.2.95.5 Choice: SDRAM Width Selection

  • Default: LPC31_SDRAM_16BIT
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_LPC31_SDRAM_8BIT: 8-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC31_SDRAM_16BIT: 16-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC31_SDRAM_32BIT: 32-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.95.6 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAMHEAP: Add external SDRAM to the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Add the external SDRAM into the heap.

1.2.95.7 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM0: Configure external SRAM (Bank 0)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Configure external SRAM Bank 0 memory and, if applicable, map then external SRAM Bank 0 into the memory map.

1.2.95.8 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM0SIZE: External SRAM size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Size of the external SRAM Bank 0 in bytes.

1.2.95.9 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM0HEAP: Add external SRAM (Bank 0) to the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Add external SRAM Bank 0 into the heap.

1.2.95.10 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM1: Configure external SRAM (Bank 1)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Configure external SRAM Bank 1 memory and, if applicable, map then external SRAM Bank 1 into the memory map.

1.2.95.11 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM1SIZE: External SRAM1 size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Size of the external SRAM Bank 1 in bytes.

1.2.95.12 CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM1HEAP: Add external SRAM (Bank 1) to the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_EXTSRAM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Add external SRAM Bank 1 into the heap.

1.2.96 Menu: LPC31xx UART Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_UART
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.96.1 CONFIG_LPC31_UART_DIVADDVAL: BAUD pre-scaler divisor

  • Type: Integer
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    BAUD pre-scaler divisor

1.2.96.2 CONFIG_LPC31_UART_DIVISOR: BAUD divisor

  • Type: Integer
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    BAUD divisor

1.2.96.3 CONFIG_LPC31_UART_MULVAL: BAUD multiplier

  • Type: Integer
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    BAUD multiplier

1.2.97 Menu: USB device driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.97.1 CONFIG_LPC31_USBDEV_EP0_MAXSIZE: EP0 Max packet size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 64
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Endpoint 0 maximum packet size. Default: 64

1.2.97.2 CONFIG_LPC31_USBDEV_FRAME_INTERRUPT: USB frame interrupt

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Handle USB Start-Of-Frame events. Enable reading SOF from interrupt handler vs. simply reading on demand. Probably a bad idea... Unless there is some issue with sampling the SOF from hardware asynchronously.

1.2.97.3 CONFIG_LPC31_USBDEV_DMA: Enable USB device DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_USBDEV
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Enable lpc31xx-specific DMA support

1.2.97.4 CONFIG_LPC31_USBDEV_REGDEBUG: Register level debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_USBDEV && CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Output detailed register-level USB device debug information. Requires also DEBUG.

1.2.98 Menu: SPI device driver options

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

1.2.98.1 CONFIG_LPC31_SPI_REGDEBUG: SPI Register level debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC31XX , CONFIG_LPC31_SPI && CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc31xx/Kconfig

    Output detailed register-level SPI device debug information. Requires also DEBUG.

1.2.100 Choice: LPC43XX Boot Configuration

  • Default: LPC43_BOOT_SRAM
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    • The startup code needs to know if the code is running from internal FLASH, external FLASH, SPIFI, or SRAM in order to initialize properly. Note that a boot device is not specified for cases where the code is copied into SRAM; those cases are all covered by LPC43_BOOT_SRAM.

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_LPC43_BOOT_SRAM: Running from SRAM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC43_BOOT_SPIFI: Running from QuadFLASH

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC43_BOOT_FLASHA: Running in internal FLASHA

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC43_BOOT_FLASHB: Running in internal FLASHA

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC43_BOOT_CS0FLASH: Running in external FLASH CS0

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC43_BOOT_CS1FLASH: Running in external FLASH CS1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC43_BOOT_CS2FLASH: Running in external FLASH CS2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_LPC43_BOOT_CS3FLASH: Running in external FLASH CS3

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX , CONFIG_LPC43_USB1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

1.2.101.37 CONFIG_LPC43_WWDT: Windowing Watchdog Timer (WWDT)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

1.2.102 CONFIG_SERIAL_TERMIOS: Serial driver TERMIOS supported

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_LPC43XX , CONFIG_LPC43_USART0 || CONFIG_LPC43_UART1 || CONFIG_LPC43_USART2 || CONFIG_LPC43_USART3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/lpc43xx/Kconfig

    Serial driver supports termios.h interfaces (tcsetattr, tcflush, etc.). If this is not defined, then the terminal settings (baud, parity, etc). are not configurable at runtime; serial streams cannot be flushed, etc..

1.2.103 Choice: Nuvoton NUC1xx Chip Selection

  • Default: ARCH_CHIP_NUC120LE3AN
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100LC1BN: NUC100LC1BN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_LOWDENSITY
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 low density chip: Flash 32K SRAM 4K, LQFP48 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100LD1BN: NUC100LD1BN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_LOWDENSITY
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 low density chip: Flash 64K SRAM 4K, LQFP48 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100LD2BN: NUC100LD2BN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_LOWDENSITY
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 low density chip: Flash 64K SRAM 8K, LQFP48 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100RC1BN: NUC100RC1BN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_LOWDENSITY
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 low density chip: Flash 32K SRAM 4K, LQFP64 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100RD1BN: NUC100RD1BN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_LOWDENSITY
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 low density chip: Flash 64K SRAM 4K, LQFP64 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100RD2BN: NUC100RD2BN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_LOWDENSITY
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 low density chip: Flash 64K SRAM 8K, LQFP64 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100LD3AN: NUC100LD3AN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_MEDIUMDENSITY
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 medium density chip: Flash 64K SRAM 16K, LQFP48 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100LE3AN: NUC100LE3AN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_MEDIUMDENSITY
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 medium density chip: Flash 128K SRAM 16K, LQFP48 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100RD3AN: NUC100RD3AN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_MEDIUMDENSITY, CONFIG_NUC_HAVE_UART2
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 medium density chip: Flash 64K SRAM 16K, LQFP64 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100RE3AN: NUC100RE3AN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_MEDIUMDENSITY, CONFIG_NUC_HAVE_UART2
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 medium density chip: Flash 128K SRAM 16K, LQFP64 package

    • Type: Boolean

    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

      Nuvoton NUC100 medium density chip: Flash 64K SRAM 8K, LQFP100 package

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC100VD3AN: NUC100VD3AN

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_FAMILY_NUC100, CONFIG_ARCH_NUC_MEDIUMDENSITY, CONFIG_NUC_HAVE_UART2
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.104 Menu: NUC1XX Peripheral Support

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.104.1 CONFIG_NUC_PDMA: Peripheral DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.104.2 CONFIG_NUC_FMC: Flash memory

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.104.3 CONFIG_NUC_EBI: External bus interface

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.104.4 CONFIG_NUC_WDT: Watchdog timer

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.104.5 CONFIG_NUC_RTC: Real time clock (RTC)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.104.6 CONFIG_NUC_TMR0: Timer0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.104.7 CONFIG_NUC_TMR1: Timer1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Type: Boolean
