  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.105 Choice: SysTick clock source

  • Default: NUC_SYSTICK_CORECLK
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_NUC_SYSTICK_CORECLK: Cortex-M0 core clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_NUC_SYSTICK_XTALHI: High speed XTAL clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_NUC_SYSTICK_XTALLO: Low speed XTAL clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_NUC_XTALLO
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_NUC_SYSTICK_XTALHId2: High speed XTAL clock/2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_NUC_SYSTICK_HCLKd2: HCLK/2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_NUC_SYSTICK_INTHId2: Internal high speed clock/2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_NUC_INTHI
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.106 Choice: NUC UART clock source

  • Default: NUC_UARTCLK_INTHI
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX , CONFIG_NUC_UART0 || CONFIG_NUC_UART1 || CONFIG_NUC_UART2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_NUC_UARTCLK_XTALHI: External 4-24MHz high speed crystal

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_NUC_UARTCLK_PLL: PLL output

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

    CONFIG_NUC_UARTCLK_INTHI: Internal 22.1184 high speed clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_NUC_INTHI
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_NUC1XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/nuc1xx/Kconfig

1.2.107 Choice: Atmel AT91SAMA5 Chip Selection

  • Default: ARCH_CHIP_ATSAMA5D33
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5

    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5D3
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAMA5D34: Atmel ATSAMA5D34

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5D3
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5D3
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

1.2.115 Menu: External Memory Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

1.2.115.1 CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS: External DDR-SDRAM Memory

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Build in support for DDR-SDRAM memory resources.

1.2.115.2 CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS_SIZE: DDR-SDRAM Memory size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Mapped size of the DDR-SDRAM memory region.

1.2.115.3 Choice: DDR-SDRAM Memory Type

  • Default: SAMA5_DDRCS_LPDDR1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    • Select the type of DDR-SDRAM memory present

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS_LPDDR1: Low-power DDR1-SDRAM (LPDDR1)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS_LPDDR2: Low-power DDR2-SDRAM-S4 (LPDDR2)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

1.2.115.4 CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0: External CS0 Memory

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Build in support for memory resources in the chip select 0 (CS0) memory region.

1.2.115.5 CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_SIZE: CS0 Memory size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Mapped size of the memory region at CS0.

1.2.115.6 Choice: CS0 Memory Type

  • Default: SAMA5_EBICS0_NOR
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    • Select the type of memory present on CS0

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_SRAM: SRAM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_PSRAM: PSRAM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_PROM: PROM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_EEPROM: EEPROM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_EPROM: EPROM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_LCD: LCD

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_NOR: NOR Flash

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    • Type: Boolean

    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Build in support for memory resources in the chip select 3 (CS3) memory region.

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

1.2.115.15 Choice: CS3 Memory Type

  • Default: SAMA5_EBICS3_NOR
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_SRAM: SRAM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_PSRAM: PSRAM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_PROM: PROM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_EEPROM: EEPROM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_EPROM: EPROM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_LCD: LCD

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_NOR: NOR Flash

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_NAND: NAND Flash

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

1.2.116 Choice: SAMA5 Boot Configuration

  • Default: SAMA5_BOOT_ISRAM
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    • The startup code needs to know if the code is running from internal SRAM, external SRAM, or CS0-3 in order to initialize properly. Note that the boot device is not specified for cases where the code is copied into internal SRAM; those cases are all covered by SAMA5_BOOT_ISRAM.

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_ISRAM: Running from internal SRAM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_SDRAM: Running from external SDRAM

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS0FLASH: Running in external FLASH CS0

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_NOR
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS0SRAM: Running in external FLASH CS0

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_SRAM || CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_PSRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS1FLASH: Running in external FLASH CS1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS1_NOR
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS1SRAM: Running in external FLASH CS1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS1_SRAM || CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS1_PSRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS2FLASH: Running in external FLASH CS2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS2_NOR
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS2SRAM: Running in external FLASH CS2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS2_SRAM || CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS2_PSRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS2FLASH: Running in external FLASH CS3

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_NOR
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS3SRAM: Running in external FLASH CS3

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_SRAM || CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_PSRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

1.2.117 Menu: Heap Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

1.2.117.1 CONFIG_SAMA5_ISRAM_HEAP: Include ISRAM in heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , !CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_ISRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Include the internal SRAM memory in the heap.

    NOTE: MM_REGIONS must also be set to indicate the total number of memory regions to be added to the heap.

    *** DO NOT SELECT THIS OPTION IF YOU ARE EXECUTING FROM INTERNAL SRAM!!** In this case, the remaining ISRAM will automatically be added to the heap (using RAM_END).

1.2.117.2 CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS_HEAP: Include DDR-SDRAM in heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_SAMA5_DDRCS && !CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_SDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Include the DDR-SDRAM memory in the heap.

    NOTE: MM_REGIONS must also be set to indicate the total number of memory regions to be added to the heap.

    *** DO NOT SELECT THIS OPTION IF YOU ARE EXECUTING FROM SDRAM!!** In this case, the remaining SDRAM will automatically be added to the heap (using RAM_END)

1.2.117.3 CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_HEAP: Include SRAM/PSRAM in heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , (CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_SRAM || CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS0_PSRAM) && !CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS0SRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Include the CS0 SRAM/PSREAM memory in the heap.

    NOTE: MM_REGIONS must also be set to indicate the total number of memory regions to be added to the heap.

    *** DO NOT SELECT THIS OPTION IF YOU ARE EXECUTING FROM CS0 SRAM!!** In this case, the remaining SRAM will automatically be added to the heap (using RAM_END).

1.2.117.4 CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS1_HEAP: Include SRAM/PSRAM in heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , (CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS1_SRAM || CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS1_PSRAM) && !CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS1SRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Include the CS1 SRAM/PSREAM memory in the heap.

    NOTE: MM_REGIONS must also be set to indicate the total number of memory regions to be added to the heap.

    *** DO NOT SELECT THIS OPTION IF YOU ARE EXECUTING FROM CS1 SRAM!!** In this case, the remaining SRAM will automatically be added to the heap (using RAM_END).

1.2.117.5 CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS2_HEAP: Include SRAM/PSRAM in heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , (CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS2_SRAM || CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS2_PSRAM) && !CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS2SRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Include the CS2 SRAM/PSREAM memory in the heap.

    NOTE: MM_REGIONS must also be set to indicate the total number of memory regions to be added to the heap.

    *** DO NOT SELECT THIS OPTION IF YOU ARE EXECUTING FROM CS2 SRAM!!** In this case, the remaining SRAM will automatically be added to the heap (using RAM_END).

1.2.117.6 CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_HEAP: Include SRAM/PSRAM in heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAMA5 , (CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_SRAM || CONFIG_SAMA5_EBICS3_PSRAM) && !CONFIG_SAMA5_BOOT_CS3SRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sama5/Kconfig

    Include the CS3 SRAM/PSREAM memory in the heap.

    *** DO NOT SELECT THIS OPTION IF YOU ARE EXECUTING FROM CS3 SRAM!!** In this case, the remaining SRAM will automatically be added to the heap (using RAM_END).

1.2.118 Choice: AT91SAM3/4 Chip Selection

  • Default: ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM3U4E
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM3U4E: ATSAM3U4E

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3U
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM3X8E: ATSAMSAM3X8E

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNOR, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM1
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM3X8C: ATSAM3X8C

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM3X4E: ATSAM3X4E

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNOR, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM1
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM3X4C: ATSAM3X4C

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM3A8C: ATSAM3A8C

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM3A4C: ATSAM3A4C

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM4LC2C: ATSAM4LC2C

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM4LC2B: ATSAM4LC2B

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM4LC2A: ATSAM4LC2A

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM4LC4C: ATSAM4LC4C

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM4LC4B: ATSAM4LC4B

    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_ATSAM4LC4A: ATSAM4LC4A

    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119 Menu: AT91SAM3/4 Peripheral Support

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.1 CONFIG_SAM_PICOCACHE: PICOCACHE

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.2 CONFIG_SAM34_OCD: On-chip DEBUG

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default Values:
    • Default: y

      Dependency: CONFIG_DEBUG_SYMBOLS

    • Default: n

      Dependency: !CONFIG_DEBUG_SYMBOLS

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.3 CONFIG_SAM34_APBA: APBA bridge

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.4 CONFIG_SAM34_AESA: Advanced Encryption Standard (AESA)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.5 CONFIG_SAM34_IISC: Inter-IC Sound (I2S) Controller

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.6 CONFIG_SAM34_SPI0: Serial Peripheral Interface 0 (SPI0)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.7 CONFIG_SAM34_SPI1: Serial Peripheral Interface 1 (SPI1)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.8 CONFIG_SAM34_SSC: Synchronous Serial Controller (SSC)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3U || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.9 CONFIG_SAM34_TC0: Timer/Counter 0 (TC0)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.10 CONFIG_SAM34_TC1: Timer/Counter 1 (TC1)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.11 CONFIG_SAM34_TC2: Timer/Counter 2 (TC2)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3U || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.12 CONFIG_SAM34_TC3: Timer/Counter 3 (TC3)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.13 CONFIG_SAM34_TC4: Timer/Counter 4 (TC4)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.14 CONFIG_SAM34_TC5: Timer/Counter 5 (TC5)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.15 CONFIG_SAM34_TC6: Timer/Counter 6 (TC6)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.18 CONFIG_SAM34_PWM: Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) Controller

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3U || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.19 CONFIG_SAM34_TWIM0: Two-wire Master Interface 0 (TWIM0)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.20 CONFIG_SAM34_TWIS0: Two-wire Slave Interface 0 (TWIS0)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.21 CONFIG_SAM34_TWIM1: Two-wire Master Interface 1 (TWIM1)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.22 CONFIG_SAM34_TWIS1: Two-wire Slave Interface 1 (TWIS1)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.23 CONFIG_SAM34_TWIM2: Two-wire Master Interface 2 (TWIM2)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.24 CONFIG_SAM34_TWIM3: Two-wire Master Interface 3 (TWIM3)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.25 CONFIG_SAM34_UART0: UART 0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3U || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.26 CONFIG_SAM34_UART1: UART 1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.27 CONFIG_SAM34_PICOUART: PicoUART

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_UART
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.28 CONFIG_SAM34_USART0: USART 0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_USART0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.29 CONFIG_SAM34_USART1: USART 1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_USART1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.30 CONFIG_SAM34_USART2: USART 2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_USART2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3U || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_USART3
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3U || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.119.65 CONFIG_SAM34_HSMCI: High Speed Multimedia Card Interface (HSMCI)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3U || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4S
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.120 Menu: AT91SAM3/4 Clock Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.120.1 CONFIG_SAM32_RESET_PERIPHCLKS: Enable all peripheral clocks on reset

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    By default, only a few necessary peripheral clocks are enabled at reset. If this setting is enabled, then all clocking will be enabled to all of the selected peripherals on reset.

1.2.120.2 CONFIG_SAM34_OSC0: External oscillator 0

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Oscillator 0 might be automatically selected for several reasons: Oscillator 0 might be the system clock or the source clock for either PLL0 or DFPLL. It might also be needed if OSC0 is the source clock for GCLK9. By selecting SAM34_OSC0, you can also force the clock to be enabled at boot time for other uses.

1.2.120.3 CONFIG_SAM34_OSC32K: 32.768KHz external oscillator

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    The 32K oscillator might be automatically selected for several reasons: The 32K oscillator may be the source clock for DFPLL0 or the source clock for GLK9 that might be used to driver PLL0. By selecting SAM34_OSC32K, you can also force the clock to be enabled at boot time. OSC32 may needed by other devices as well (AST, WDT, PICUART, RTC).

1.2.120.4 CONFIG_SAM34_RC80M: 80MHz RC oscillator

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    The 80MHz RC oscillator might be automatically selected for several reasons: This might be the system clock or the source clock for the DFPLL or it could be the source for GCLK9 that drives PLL0. By selecting SAM34_RC80M, you can also force the clock to be enabled at boot time for other uses.

1.2.120.5 CONFIG_SAM34_RCFAST: Fast RC oscillator

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    The fast RC oscillator might be automatically selected for several reasons: The 12/8/4 fast RC oscillator may be used as the system clock or as the source for GLCK9 that drives PLL0. If not then, it may be enabled by setting the SAM34_RCFASTxM configuration variable.

1.2.120.6 Choice: Fast RC Oscillator Speed

  • Default: SAM34_RCFAST8M
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L , CONFIG_SAM34_RCFAST
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_SAM34_RCFAST12M: 12MHz

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L , CONFIG_SAM34_RCFAST
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAM34_RCFAST8M: 8MHz

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L , CONFIG_SAM34_RCFAST
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAM34_RCFAST4M: 4MHz

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L , CONFIG_SAM34_RCFAST
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.120.7 CONFIG_SAM34_RC1M: 1MHz RC oscillator

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    The 1MHz RC oscillator might be automatically selected for several reasons: The 1MHz RC oscillator may be used as the system block or may be the source clock for GLCK9 that drives PLL0. By selecting SAM34_RC1M, you can also force the clock to be enabled at boot time for other purposes.

1.2.120.8 CONFIG_SAM34_RC32K: 32KHz RC oscillator

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM4L
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    The 32KHz RC oscillator might be automatically selected for several reasons: The 32KHz RC oscillator may be used as the input to DFLL0 or as the input to GCLK9 that drives PLL0. By selecting SAM34_RC32K, you can also force the clock to be enabled at boot time for other purposes.

1.2.121 Menu: External Memory Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.121.1 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTNAND: Configure external NAND

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNAND
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Configure external NAND memory and, if applicable, map then external NAND into the memory map.

1.2.121.2 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTNANDSIZE: External NAND size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTNAND
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Size of the external NAND in bytes.

1.2.121.3 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTNOR: Configure external NOR memory

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTNOR
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Configure external NOR memory and, if applicable, map then external NOR into the memory map.

1.2.121.4 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTNORSIZE: External NOR size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTNOR
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Size of the external NOR in bytes.

1.2.121.5 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAM: Configure external DRAM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Configure external DRAM memory and, if applicable, map then external DRAM into the memory map.

1.2.121.6 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAMSIZE: External SDRAM size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Size of the external SDRAM in bytes.

1.2.121.7 Choice: SDRAM Width Selection

  • Default: SAM34_SDRAM_16BIT
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_SAM34_SDRAM_8BIT: 8-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAM34_SDRAM_16BIT: 16-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    CONFIG_SAM34_SDRAM_32BIT: 32-bit

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAM
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.121.8 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAMHEAP: Add external SDRAM to the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTDRAM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Add the external SDRAM into the heap.

1.2.121.9 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM0: Configure external SRAM (Bank 0)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Configure external SRAM Bank 0 memory and, if applicable, map then external SRAM Bank 0 into the memory map.

1.2.121.10 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM0SIZE: External SRAM size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Size of the external SRAM Bank 0 in bytes.

1.2.121.11 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM0HEAP: Add external SRAM (Bank 0) to the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM0
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Add external SRAM Bank 0 into the heap.

1.2.121.12 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM1: Configure external SRAM (Bank 1)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_EXTSRAM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Configure external SRAM Bank 1 memory and, if applicable, map then external SRAM Bank 1 into the memory map.

1.2.121.13 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM1SIZE: External SRAM1 size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Size of the external SRAM Bank 1 in bytes.

1.2.121.14 CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM1HEAP: Add external SRAM (Bank 1) to the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_EXTSRAM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Add external SRAM Bank 1 into the heap.

1.2.122 CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ: GPIO pin interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    Enable support for interrupting GPIO pins

1.2.123 CONFIG_GPIOA_IRQ: GPIOA interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.124 CONFIG_GPIOB_IRQ: GPIOB interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.125 CONFIG_GPIOC_IRQ: GPIOC interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.126 CONFIG_GPIOD_IRQ: GPIOD interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.127 CONFIG_GPIOE_IRQ: GPIOE interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.128 CONFIG_GPIOF_IRQ: GPIOF interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_GPIO_IRQ , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3X || CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM3A
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

1.2.129 CONFIG_WDT_ENABLED_ON_RESET: Enabled on reset

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_WDT
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    The WDT can be enabled at reset. This is controlled by the WDTAUTO fuse. The WDT will be set in basic mode, RCSYS is set as source for CLK_CNT, and PSEL will be set to a value giving Tpsel above 100 ms (SAM4L)

    This setting informs that start-up logic that the watchdog is enabled.

1.2.130 CONFIG_WDT_DISABLE_ON_RESET: Disable on reset

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_SAM34 , CONFIG_SAM34_WDT , CONFIG_WDT_ENABLED_ON_RESET
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/sam34/Kconfig

    If the WDT can be enabled at reset then this setting may be used to configure and disable the watchdog timer very early in the boot sequence.

1.2.131 Choice: STM32 Chip Selection

  • Default: ARCH_CHIP_STM32F103ZET6
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32L151C6: STM32L151C6

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM3, CONFIG_STM32_STM32L15XX, CONFIG_STM32_ENERGYLITE
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      STM32L 48-pin EnergyLite, 32KB FLASH, 10KB SRAM, 4KB EEPRROM

    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.132 CONFIG_STM32_DFU: DFU bootloader

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Configure and position code for use with the STMicro DFU bootloader. Do not select this option if you will load code using JTAG/SWM.

1.2.133 Menu: STM32 Peripheral Support

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.1 CONFIG_STM32_ADC1: ADC1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.2 CONFIG_STM32_ADC2: ADC2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.3 CONFIG_STM32_ADC3: ADC3

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.4 CONFIG_STM32_ADC4: ADC4

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F30XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.5 CONFIG_STM32_COMP: COMP

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32L15XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.6 CONFIG_STM32_BKP: BKP

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.7 CONFIG_STM32_BKPSRAM: BKP RAM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.8 CONFIG_STM32_CAN1: CAN1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_CAN, CONFIG_STM32_CAN
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE && !CONFIG_STM32_STM32L15XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.9 CONFIG_STM32_CAN2: CAN2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_CAN, CONFIG_STM32_CAN
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.11 CONFIG_STM32_CEC: CEC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_DMA
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE || (CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE && CONFIG_STM32_HIGHDENSITY)
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_DAC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_PHY
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CONNECTIVITYLINE || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.133.20 CONFIG_STM32_FSMC: FSMC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_CONNECTIVITYLINE && (CONFIG_STM32_HIGHDENSITY || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX)
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CONNECTIVITYLINE || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX || (CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE && CONFIG_STM32_HIGHDENSITY) || (CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && (CONFIG_STM32_HIGHDENSITY || CONFIG_STM32_MEDIUMDENSITY)) || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F30XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Selects: CONFIG_SPI, CONFIG_STM32_SPI
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CONNECTIVITYLINE || CONFIG_STM32_STM32L15XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX || (CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE && CONFIG_STM32_HIGHDENSITY) || (CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_HIGHDENSITY)

  • Type: Boolean

  • Type: Boolean

1.2.134 Menu: Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.1 Choice: CAN1 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_CAN1_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_CAN1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_CAN1_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_CAN1_REMAP1: CAN1 alternate pin remapping #1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_CAN1_REMAP2: CAN1 alternate pin remapping #2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.2 CONFIG_STM32_CAN2_REMAP: CAN2 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CONNECTIVITYLINE && CONFIG_STM32_CAN2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.3 CONFIG_STM32_CEC_REMAP: CEC Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_CEC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.4 CONFIG_STM32_ETH_REMAP: Ethernet Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CONNECTIVITYLINE && CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.5 CONFIG_STM32_I2C1_REMAP: I2C1 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_I2C1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.6 CONFIG_STM32_SPI1_REMAP: SPI1 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_SPI1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.7 CONFIG_STM32_SPI3_REMAP: SPI3 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_SPI3 && !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.8 Choice: TIM1 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_TIM1_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_FULL_REMAP: Full pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_PARTIAL_REMAP: Partial pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.9 Choice: TIM2 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_TIM2_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_FULL_REMAP: Full pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_PARTIAL_REMAP_1: Partial pin remapping #1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_PARTIAL_REMAP_2: Partial pin remapping #2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.10 Choice: TIM3 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_TIM3_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM3_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM3_FULL_REMAP: Full pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM3_PARTIAL_REMAP: Partial pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.11 CONFIG_STM32_TIM4_REMAP: TIM4 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM4
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.12 CONFIG_STM32_TIM9_REMAP: TIM9 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM9
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.13 CONFIG_STM32_TIM10_REMAP: TIM10 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM10
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.14 CONFIG_STM32_TIM11_REMAP: TIM11 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM11
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.15 CONFIG_STM32_TIM12_REMAP: TIM12 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM12
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.16 CONFIG_STM32_TIM13_REMAP: TIM13 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM13
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.17 CONFIG_STM32_TIM14_REMAP: TIM14 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM14
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.18 CONFIG_STM32_TIM15_REMAP: TIM15 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM15
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.19 CONFIG_STM32_TIM16_REMAP: TIM16 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM16
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.20 CONFIG_STM32_TIM17_REMAP: TIM17 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM17
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.21 CONFIG_STM32_USART1_REMAP: USART1 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_USART1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.22 CONFIG_STM32_USART2_REMAP: USART2 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_USART2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.134.23 Choice: USART3 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_USART3_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_USART3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_USART3_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_USART3_FULL_REMAP: Full pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_USART3_PARTIAL_REMAP: Partial pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.135 CONFIG_STM32_FLASH_PREFETCH: Enable FLASH Pre-fetch

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default Values:
    • Default: y

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F427

    • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable FLASH prefetch and F2 and F4 parts (FLASH pre-fetch is always enabled on F1 parts). Some early revisions of F4 parts do not support FLASH pre-fetch properly and enabling this option may interfere with ADC accuracy.

1.2.136 Choice: JTAG Configuration

  • Default: STM32_JTAG_DISABLE
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    • JTAG Enable settings (by default JTAG-DP and SW-DP are disabled)

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_JTAG_DISABLE: Disable all JTAG clocking

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_JTAG_FULL_ENABLE: Enable full SWJ (JTAG-DP + SW-DP)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_JTAG_NOJNTRST_ENABLE: Enable full SWJ (JTAG-DP + SW-DP) but without JNTRST

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_JTAG_SW_ENABLE: Set JTAG-DP disabled and SW-DP enabled

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.137 CONFIG_STM32_DISABLE_IDLE_SLEEP_DURING_DEBUG: Disable IDLE Sleep (WFI) in debug mode

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In debug configuration, disables the WFI instruction in the IDLE loop to prevent the JTAG from disconnecting. With some JTAG debuggers, such as the ST-LINK2 with OpenOCD, if the ARM is put to sleep via the WFI instruction, the debugger will disconnect, terminating the debug session.

1.2.138 CONFIG_STM32_FORCEPOWER: Force power

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Timer and I2C devices may need to the following to force power to be applied unconditionally at power up. (Otherwise, the device is powered when it is initialized).

1.2.139 CONFIG_ARCH_BOARD_STM32_CUSTOM_CLOCKCONFIG: Custom clock configuration

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enables special, board-specific STM32 clock configuration.

1.2.140 CONFIG_STM32_CCMEXCLUDE: Exclude CCM SRAM from the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y

    Dependency: CONFIG_ARCH_DMA || CONFIG_ELF

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F20XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F30XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Exclude CCM SRAM from the HEAP because (1) it cannot be used for DMA and (2) it appears to be impossible to execute ELF modules from CCM RAM.

1.2.141 CONFIG_STM32_DMACAPABLE: Workaround non-DMA capable memory

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default Values:
    • Default: y

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX && !CONFIG_STM32_CCMEXCLUDE

    • Default: n

      Dependency: !CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX || CONFIG_STM32_CCMEXCLUDE

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_ARCH_DMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This option enables the DMA interface stm32_dmacapable that can be used to check if it is possible to do DMA from the selected address. Drivers then may use this information to determine if they should attempt the DMA or fall back to a different transfer method.

1.2.142 CONFIG_STM32_FSMC_SRAM: External SRAM on FSMC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_HEAP2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_FSMC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In addition to internal SRAM, SRAM may also be available through the FSMC.

1.2.143 CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_PWM: TIM1 PWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 1 for use by PWM

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM1 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.144 CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_CHANNEL: TIM1 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM1 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1,..,4}

1.2.145 CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_PWM: TIM2 PWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 2 for use by PWM

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM2 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.146 CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_CHANNEL: TIM2 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM2 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1,..,4}

  • Type: Boolean

1.2.172 CONFIG_STM32_TIM17_CHANNEL: TIM17 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM17_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM17 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1}

1.2.173 CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC: TIM1 ADC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1 && CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 1 for use by ADC

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. If STM32_TIM1 is defined then the following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for ADC conversion. Note that ADC usage requires two definition: Not only do you have to assign the timer for used by the ADC, but then you also have to configure which ADC channel it is assigned to.

1.2.174 Choice: Select TIM1 ADC channel

  • Default: STM32_TIM1_ADC1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC1: TIM1 ADC channel 1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC1_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC1
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM1 to trigger ADC1

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC2: TIM1 ADC channel 2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC2_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM1 to trigger ADC2

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC3: TIM1 ADC channel 3

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC3_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM1 to trigger ADC3

1.2.175 CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC: TIM2 ADC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM2 && CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 1 for use by ADC

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. If STM32_TIM2 is defined then the following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for ADC conversion. Note that ADC usage requires two definition: Not only do you have to assign the timer for used by the ADC, but then you also have to configure which ADC channel it is assigned to.

1.2.176 Choice: Select TIM2 ADC channel

  • Default: STM32_TIM2_ADC1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC1: TIM2 ADC channel 1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC1_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC1
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM2 to trigger ADC1

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC2: TIM2 ADC channel 2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC2_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM2 to trigger ADC2

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC3: TIM2 ADC channel 3

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC3_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM2 to trigger ADC3

1.2.177 CONFIG_STM32_TIM3_ADC: TIM3 ADC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n

    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.185 CONFIG_STM32_ADC1_SAMPLE_FREQUENCY: ADC1 Sampling Frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC1_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    ADC1 sampling frequency. Default: 100Hz

1.2.186 CONFIG_STM32_ADC1_TIMTRIG: ADC1 Timer Trigger

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Range: 0 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC1_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Values 0:CC1 1:CC2 2:CC3 3:CC4 4:TRGO

1.2.187 CONFIG_STM32_ADC2_SAMPLE_FREQUENCY: ADC2 Sampling Frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC2_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    ADC2 sampling frequency. Default: 100Hz

1.2.188 CONFIG_STM32_ADC2_TIMTRIG: ADC2 Timer Trigger

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Range: 0 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC2_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Values 0:CC1 1:CC2 2:CC3 3:CC4 4:TRGO

1.2.189 CONFIG_STM32_ADC3_SAMPLE_FREQUENCY: ADC3 Sampling Frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC3_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    ADC3 sampling frequency. Default: 100Hz

1.2.190 CONFIG_STM32_ADC3_TIMTRIG: ADC3 Timer Trigger

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Range: 0 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC3_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Values 0:CC1 1:CC2 2:CC3 3:CC4 4:TRGO

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. If STM32_TIM1 is defined then the following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for DAC conversion. Note that DAC usage requires two definition: Not only do you have to assign the timer for used by the DAC, but then you also have to configure which DAC channel it is assigned to.

  • Default: STM32_TIM1_DAC1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_DAC

    • Type: Boolean

    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM1 to trigger DAC2
